resources.string: Tip! You can enter punctuation marks without first deleting the space.

"If you select a secondary language you will get word suggestions from two languages at the same time. The primary language determines the keyboard layout.
Note! Bilingual input only works if both languages use the Latin (ABCâ€¦) alphabet. "
Browse the different layouts and select your favorite
Make sure the phone is not in silent mode
To further personalize your keyboard, for example by changing keyboard skin, tap @drawable/icon.
